page.title: 16POPULATION TRENDS/HOBBIES
page.content: { RESULTS OF SURVEY FROM CROSS SECTION {OF WILLAND VILLAGE. UNDER 10={22%}10TO20= {16%} 20TO40={32%}40TO60={12%}60+={18% {WHERE DO PEOPLE IN YOUR HOUSE GO TO {WORK ?}WORK AT HOME={20%}IN WILLAND={ {35%}GO OUT OF WILLAND={30%}WORK PART TIME={11%} WORK AT NIGHT={3%.}THIS SURVEY INCLUDES ALL PEOPLE IN A HOUSE UNDER 16. SOME OVER LAP CATEGORIES. -------------------------------------- {POPULAR HOBBIES}SPORTS (SWIMMING) BIRD WATCHING, FISHING, KNITTING, READING, BOARD GAMES,CARD GAMES AND COLLECTING (STAMPS, COINS, BOOKS,POST CARDS,). { }
